alert.note: Alert for Leon; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 17 at 7:49PM EDT until April 17 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WAKULLA AND EASTERN LEON COUNTIES... At 748 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Tallahassee to Crawfordville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... St. Marks, Tallahassee, Crawfordville, Woodville, Florida A And M, Wakulla, Ralford Greenway, Newport, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Wakulla Springs, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Miccosukee, Eight Mile Pond, Killearn Estates, Chaires, Bethel and State Capital Complex. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
